name: Bearly Home (Freddie Babord)
description:
A lighthearted couch party game, that Supports 2-4 players. Collect all the gems, and get home safe, whatever you do.. Don't be late!!

Developed as part of Global Game Jam 2019 by

  • Beth Reed - Designer
  • Christian Maund - 3D Artist 
  • Freddie Babord - Developer
  • Helen Simm - GUI Designer / Artist
